Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKingNoComment
Data.Text: I tire of chatting.\n\nGo and do what I've ordered you to do.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKing
Data.Text: You stand at the gate of the Reverend King, your liege.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKing_1_a1
Data.Text: I shall stand by your pointiness, just let me in!

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKing_1_a2
Data.Text: I forgot my sword inside, please let me in.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKing_1_a3
Data.Text: I don't think we're going to win. There's so many of them and I'm scared like a little pony.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKing_2_a1
Data.Text: Where I point, you shall fight. Stay there!

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfTheReverendKing_2_a3
Data.Text: Hide somewhere else, this spot is taken!
